title: Microchip MCP23008 8-bit I/O expander
label: MCP23008
description:
Provides 8-bit, general purpose, parallel I/O expansion for I2C bus.

Datasheet: http://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/devicedoc/21919e.pdf

3.label: A2
3.description: Hardware address input. Must be biased externally.

4.label: A1
4.description: Hardware address input. Must be biased externally.

5.label: A0
5.description: Hardware address input. Must be biased externally.

6.label: Reset
6.description: External reset input. Must be biased externally.

8.label: INT
8.description: Interrupt output. Can be configured for active-high, active-low or open-drain.

10.label: GP0
10.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

11.label: GP1
11.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

12.label: GP2
12.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

13.label: GP3
13.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

14.label: GP4
14.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

15.label: GP5
15.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

16.label: GP6
16.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.

17.label: GP7
17.description: Bidirectional I/O pin. Can be enabled for interrupt-on-change and/or internal weak pull-up resistor.
